job.title: Data Scientist - Data Analytics
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer & Network Security
job.description: This is an environment strongunlike anythingstrong strongin the hightech worldstrong and the secret of Costcos success is its culture The value Costco puts on its employees is well documented in articles from a variety of publishers including Bloomberg and Forbes Our employees and our members come FIRST Costco is well known for its generosity and community service and has won many awards for its philanthropy The company joins with its employees to take an active role in volunteering by sponsoring many opportunities to help others In 2018 Costco contributed over 39 million to organizations such as United Way and Childrens Miracle Network HospitalsbrbrCostco IT is responsible for the strongtechnical future of Costco Wholesalestrong the second largest retailer in the world with wholesale operations in twelve countries Despite our size and explosive international expansion we continue to provide a family employee centric atmosphere in which our employees thrive and succeed As proof Costco consistently ranks in the strongtop five of Forbes Americas Best EmployersstrongbrbrstrongThe Data Scientist  Data Analytics is responsible for generating insights and to augment decision making by the businessstrong At Costco we are on a mission to strongsignificantly leverage big data to provide better products and services for our membersstrong This role is focused on advanced analytics machine learning and data science delivery to support multiple business areas This role will partner with Product Owner and business owners tostrong build test advanced analytics solutions and turn data into actionable insightsstrong This is a senior role to enhance the maturity of advanced analytics methods and coach the team across multiple PODs The Data Scientist is a knowledgeable leader with an ability to lead and is passionate about data and using machine learning to solve business problems The right candidate will have deep knowledge of applying data science for forecasting customer analysis item and inventory management and other areas of retailbrbrWe are looking for a highly motivated customer focused professional who wants to work in a fun and highly collaborative environment and willing to be the player as well as coach for the data science community at CostcobrbrIf you want to be a part of one of thestrong uBEST to work for companiesu in the worldstrong simply apply and let your career be reimaginedbrbrstrongu ROLE brustrongul li Leads the analysis by applying statistics machine learning and analytic approaches to predict and optimize business outcomes li li Designs and builds MLDL models to solve business problems li li Correctly frames a problem and comes up with a hypothesis li li Assesses the effectiveness and accuracy of models on an ongoing basis li li Identifies new data that could enhance the quality and accuracy of models to improve predictions li li Communicates results effectively with storytelling and visualization li li Coaches the team in feature engineering using machine learning techniques li li Performs peer review for another Data Scientists work li li Provides feedback to enhance the testing framework and MLOps li li Extends beyond core data science work to perform data wrangling and data preparation li brbrulstronguRequiredbrustrongul li 5 years experience in delivering business insights Statistical and Reporting tools Python R SQL PowerBI li li Knowledge of Deep Learning and Neural Networks and its applications li li Strong experience working in Cloud AWS Azure based analytics
